summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- Issue: The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test.
  Recommendation: Investigate the cause of the failure and optimize the page to improve load times, TTFB, and FCP.

issues.recommendation: The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test.
The homepage has a higher load time (592 ms) compared to the pricing page (317 ms) and blog page (553 ms).
TTFB for the "How It Works" page is not available due to the test failure.
FCP for the pricing page (244.8 ms) is higher than the blog page (364.4 ms), although the overall load time for the pricing page is lower.

insights: Key insight 1: The passed tests for the homepage, pricing page, and blog page indicate good performance and optimization.
Key insight 2: The failed test for the "How It Works" page highlights the need for further investigation and optimization.
Key insight 3: Comparing TTFB, load time, and FCP across pages can help prioritize optimization efforts and identify areas for improvement.
